name: Memory.Prg
description:
Memory.Prg is an implementation of the board game of the same name. 18 cards are placed randomly in a rectangular grid of the size 3x6. Each symbol is included in the cards twice. The goal is to find as many pairs of symbols as possible. Each turn, a player is allowed to turn two symbols, and if they do not match, turn them face down again. If the opened cards a a pair of the same symbol, the player is rewarded a point and is allowed to turn another two cards.

The game can be played with one to three human players, there is no computer opponent implemented. The game can load different graphical tile sets and offers functions to create an image template for creating those directly from the program. There are three difficulty level. On "Hardcore", after 10 turns, all hidden cards are mixed randomly.

The game is in German language and is only running on the high-res monochrome monitor.
gamePlay: Board game, Cards / tiles, Mental training, Tile matching puzzle
